title: Beautiful Berri
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Irrigation - Murray River Region (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Murray River (N.S.W.-S. Aust.)
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Rivers - Victoria
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Food industry and trade - Australia
abstract: A silent amateur production (with intertitles) of scenes of Berri that looks at the industries, resources and lifestyles of the area and that era.
description: This amateur production shows scenes of Berri featuring the vineyards of the area, orange orchards and other fruit producing farms as well as the processing industries in the district. Scenes include women packing products in the factories, irrigation systems and the Murray River.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2002055; Highlights from Victoria's Murray Region captured on film; Active; 2011
